description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	

	New Features

SLIDESNET-29079	Add support for rendering text in Arabic language on thumbnails
SLIDESNET-33122	Setting Axis line number format
SLIDESNET-33165	Add support for Export of PPTX into HTML format
SLIDESNET-33306	Support for opening the password protected presentation in read only mode in PowerPoint
SLIDESNET-33314	Accessing document properties in a password protected presentation

	Investigations

SLIDESNET-33307	Investigate the possibility to add support for opening the password protected presentation in read only mode in PowerPoint
SLIDESNET-33311	Slide.SlideId property is missing in Aspose.Slides for .NET 6.1.0	

	Bugs

SLIDESNET-26194	Slides formatting error
SLIDESNET-29802	NullReferenceException on accessing PPT with PresentationEx
SLIDESNET-29815	Exception is thrown on creating Radar and RadarWithMarkers charts
SLIDESNET-30513	PptEditException on cloning slide
SLIDESNET-30739	Slide Master background missing in exported PDF
SLIDESNET-30878	Master slide background missing in saved presentation
SLIDESNET-32005	PowerPoint slide not writing to disk
SLIDESNET-32081	Slide content missing in Thumbnail
SLIDESNET-33120	Pie Chart formatting lost on changing series data
SLIDESNET-33150	ClusteredColumn Chart has DataLabels in Output PPTX
SLIDESNET-33184	After hiding data labels of a chart with the help Aspose.Slides, PowerPoint 2010 is showing hidden labels
SLIDESNET-33185	Unable to add line chart without markers
SLIDESNET-33187	Bullet color don't change for PPTX
SLIDESNET-33191	ChartEx.ValueAxis.TextProperties and ChartEx.CategoryAxis.TextProperties is null
SLIDESNET-33200	Creating SVG throws exception
SLIDESNET-33201	Chart.ValueAxis.Title is null So, Can't able to add text of axis
SLIDESNET-33215	Saving PPTX to PDF create corrupt PDF document
SLIDESNET-33245	Bubble chart cloning issue
SLIDESNET-33290	Build Error C2686 while compiling in Managed C++
SLIDESNET-33308	Cannot able to change font of CategoriesAxis and ValueAxis
SLIDESNET-33339	Charts that are rendered fine in Slides 6.0 don't work in Slides 6.1
SLIDESNET-33340	Charts are not rendering in Framework 1.1 but do work fine in Framework 2.0
SLIDESNET-33397	Presentation is corrupted after removing all ChartSeries of same type from Chart
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
